regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): stream=''.join(eval(re.findall('file:.+?\[([^\]]+)',page_data)[0])) try: import urllib.parse final = urllib.parse.unquote(stream) except: import urllib final = urllib.unquote(stream) return final+'|user-agent=ipad&origin=https://www.rtp.pt&referer=https://www.rtp.pt/'
